title: Rector Academiae Lipsiensis Funus Consulare ... Dn. Christiani Laurentii ab Adlershelm, Sacrae Caesareae Maiestatis, & Serenissimi Electoris Saxoniae Johannis Georgii II. Consiliarii, Scabinatus item Electoralis Assessoris, Consulisque Senioris splendidissimi, deque Bono Publico summe meriti, Proceribus Civibusq[ue] Academicis indicit, Utq[ue] pompam funebrem post horam I. stipatissima frequentia addecoratum eant magnopere Eosdem rogat atq[ue] obtestatur
creator: Feller, Joachim
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Feller, Joachim: Rector Academiae Lipsiensis Funus Consulare ... Dn. Christiani Laurentii ab Adlershelm, Sacrae Caesareae Maiestatis, & Serenissimi Electoris Saxoniae Johannis Georgii II. Consiliarii, Scabinatus item Electoralis Assessoris, Consulisque Senioris splendidissimi, deque Bono Publico summe meriti, Proceribus Civibusq[ue] Academicis indicit, Utq[ue] pompam funebrem post horam I. stipatissima frequentia addecoratum eant magnopere Eosdem rogat atq[ue] obtestatur. [Leipzig]  Berlin 1684
